resources.string:
Hello! 
 My name is Ezichi Amarachi. 
 
 I love photography and Programming. lol 
 I guess you could also say i love the letter P. 
 
 You will have to guess how old i am.. Yeah, i said what i said.. 
 
 Been learning android development for almost half year now.. 
 It has been cool, but it has also been a really bumpy ride
